Data

Class JsonBase<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.DataBase<T>
      • Data.JsonBase<T>

  • public class JsonBase<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends DataBase<T>
    Responsible for working with collection. Performs serialization and deserialization of collection objects in json format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Deserializes objects from a file to a collection.
      void series()
      Serializes collection objects to a file.
